name: sotobaco-kintone
description: kintone JSカスタマイズ管理（cli-kintone）

scripts.upload:69: export $(cat .env | xargs) && npx cli-kintone customize apply --app 69 --base-url "$KINTONE_BASE_URL" --username "$KINTONE_USERNAME" --password "$KINTONE_PASSWORD" --input dest/app69-manifest.json --yes
scripts.upload:74: export $(cat .env | xargs) && npx cli-kintone customize apply --app 74 --base-url "$KINTONE_BASE_URL" --username "$KINTONE_USERNAME" --password "$KINTONE_PASSWORD" --input dest/app74-manifest.json --yes
scripts.upload:93: export $(cat .env | xargs) && npx cli-kintone customize apply --app 93 --base-url "$KINTONE_BASE_URL" --username "$KINTONE_USERNAME" --password "$KINTONE_PASSWORD" --input dest/app93-manifest.json --yes
scripts.upload:86: export $(cat .env | xargs) && npx cli-kintone customize apply --app 86 --base-url "$KINTONE_BASE_URL" --username "$KINTONE_USERNAME" --password "$KINTONE_PASSWORD" --input dest/stepmail-enroll-manifest.json --yes
scripts.upload:96: export $(cat .env | xargs) && npx cli-kintone customize apply --app 96 --base-url "$KINTONE_BASE_URL" --username "$KINTONE_USERNAME" --password "$KINTONE_PASSWORD" --input dest/blog-publish-manifest.json --yes
scripts.upload:all: npm run upload:69 && npm run upload:74 && npm run upload:93 && npm run upload:86 && npm run upload:96
